course_subtitle: Master the fundamentals of machine learning through interactive modules and hands-on examples

modules.title: What is Machine Learning?
goals: Understand the definition and core concepts of machine learning
Differentiate between supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning
Identify real-world applications of machine learning

modules.title: Understanding Neural Networks
goals: Learn the basic structure of artificial neural networks
Understand how neurons, layers, and activation functions work
Visualize how neural networks learn from data

modules.title: Training Your First Model
goals: Set up your first machine learning model
Understand training data, validation, and testing
Evaluate model performance using key metrics
